label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M1 (Spice Market)
notes: Dense spice-market character. Stall strips on edges. Clusters near entry, open node near mid cut.

label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M2 (Fabric & Textile JOG)
notes: Wider stalls, fewer count. Jog +2.0m East breaks LoS. Asymmetric left/right stall count. Well node at Y=41.

label: Bazaar Main — BZ-M3 (Rug & Craft, approaching Arch)
notes: Sparse at south, denser approaching arch. Hero arch zone (Y=65-68) has no stalls. One diagonal stall near north cut.

label: Clear Travel Zone — M1
notes: NO props/shops.

notes: NO props/shops.

label: East Side Hall (Widened)

label: West Side Hall (Widened)

notes: Spawn safety cover + quick access to all lanes via bazaar center and side connectors.

notes: Spawn safety cover + landmark arch threshold into bazaar.
